page.title: 08EDUCATION IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {EDUCATION IN WOODHALL SPA {Further Education:}At the Grammar School pupils can stay up to 18,take subjects at G.C.E.Advanced level and then move on to Universities, Polytechnics or Colleges,whilst those at Gartree on leaving at 16 are able to take courses at Boston or Lincoln Technical Colleges. {Independent Schooling:}In Woodhall Spa is St.Hugh's Preparatory School which opened for boys in 1925 and became co-educational in 1980.It caters for children of 7 to 13 from a wide area.A few children from the area attend another independent day school,Maypole House,which is nearby at Horncastle and which caters for 3 to 16 yr.olds. {Non-Vocational Classes:}For students over the age of 18 are held at Horncastle & Tattershall during the winter months.
